member.summary: Represents a custom assembly load context for loading plugins.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified plugin path.

member.summary: Loads the specified assembly by its name.

member.returns: The loaded assembly, or null if the assembly cannot be found.

member.name: M:El_Garnan_Plugin_Loader.PluginLoadContext.LoadUnmanagedDll(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified unmanaged DLL by its name.
member.param: The name of the unmanaged DLL to load.
member.returns: A pointer to the loaded unmanaged DLL, or IntPtr.Zero if the DLL cannot be found.
